title: 2/13/18 - 'The Next Biggest Scandal'? (Michael Malice & Jonathon Dunne join Glenn)
description:
Hour 1 
The next biggest scandal?...Susan Rice caught red-handed again...unusual message… ‘by the book’...Young men left America to join ISIS...only to end up disappointed?...'cooking and cleaning' ...Jeff Sessions draws fire for comment?...Charles C.W. Cooke summed it up...President Obama used the same word with zero backlash ...Winter Olympics Update...Live from P.F. Chang's?...Korean BBQ: Take it or leave it? ...Mexican nacho fries and orange chicken, Yum!

 

Hour 2 
Where competence goes to die?...The urgent problem caused by President Obama? ...Freedom’s Disciple host Jonathon Dunne joins the show from Ireland to dig into the real issues of DACA...shares his own personal journey trying to become an American citizen...Callers share their ideas for Jonathon to come back to the U.S. …lowering standards?  ...President Trump wants to cut food stamp program and proposes this new program…a box of ‘shelf-stable’ items?... ‘Almond milk is not milk! Almonds don't have nipples’…there are no baby almonds with their almond mom

 

Hour 3 
Love ‘em or hate ‘em, don't lose sight of humanity?...Flashback to 2001: White powder panic with the anthrax scare ...Author and journalist Michael Malice (michaelmalice.com) joins the show to discuss Kim Jong Un's sister...deep inside North Korea…the Kim family is seen as godlike...worst place on earth for freedom...does South Korea even want to get to get along with North Korea, is reunification possible? ...US military destroys Russian tanks in Syria, in self-defense against unprovoked rogue troops....hundreds of Russians dead?...more war coming?... Pat and Stu together again for ‘the best TV show ever’ ...Millennials can't sail
The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck and Stu Burguiere, Weekdays 9am–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
